name: Irizi'fife'rencpok
content:
Irizi'fife'rencpok, known by the core name Zififerenc, was a Chiss who served as the Patriarch of the Irizi family, one of the Nine Ruling Families of the Chiss Ascendancy, during the Nikardun campaigns.
The Patriarchs of the Nine Ruling Families were mentioned in Timothy Zahn's 2020 novel Thrawn Ascendancy: Chaos Rising, the first book of Zahn's Star Wars: The Ascendancy Trilogy. The Irizi Patriarch was mentioned specifically in Chaos Rising's sequel, the April 2021 novel Thrawn Ascendancy: Greater Good. Irizi'fife'rencpok first appeared and was first identified in the November 2021 finale of the trilogy, Thrawn Ascendancy: Lesser Evil.
